item.title: Baby Steps Typescript
item.description: Intro Typescript as the repo and many other people mention is a superset of JavaScript that compiles to clean JavaScript output. NOTE If you are Totally new on Typescript, check out this amazing Understanding TypeScript’s type notation blog post If you are unsure if Typescript is or not a superset and what actually superset and subset means I recommend you to read this SO post Saying this, let’s start writting some JS and then the equivalent in Typescript.
